google_reviews.author: Harry Callahan
google_reviews.review: PLEASANTLY surprised and very much looking forward. Thus far everyone has been so helpful, professional and I have friends whom lived years off and on property.  All with positive feedback

owner_response.text: We're so glad to hear you've had a great experience so far! If there's anything else we can assist you with, please don't hesitate to ask.

google_reviews.author: Darlene R. Baumann
google_reviews.review: Beautiful place to live. Feels like in country setting with grounds to walk,feels like a preserve  with geese,deer,squirrels  and rabbits. I noticed 2 resident herons earlier this summer. People friendly.  Good access to two roads into town and freeways. Great donut shp,coffee and philly cheese sandwiches closeby.

google_reviews.author: Lauren Trick
google_reviews.review: Jourdan and her husband are extremely helpful and truly care about your experience! They helped to make our day more beautiful than I could have imagined.

google_reviews.author: Kyle Chapman
google_reviews.review: Amazing apartments that are slightly off the beaten path. Sandwiched between two beautiful parks with a amazing lakeside views and beach access. Good pricing, good people, and beautiful grounds for an affordable lease.

google_reviews.author: Uno Mundo
google_reviews.review:
The only issue is my upstairs neighbor
makes noise during quiet time 10pm to 8am.

owner_response.text: We're very sorry to learn that you're experiencing frustrations due to noise transfer. That's never the type of feedback we want to hear from our guests. Please be assured that our residents' satisfaction is among our top priorities. Should this issue persist, please let us know right away by reaching out to us at 360-295-8200. We'll do all we can to help ensure you have a pleasant and comfortable living experience with us at Old Mill Village. Thank you.

google_reviews.author: Vincent Regimbal
google_reviews.review: Beautiful place to live right on lake whatcom

owner_response.text: Dear Jay, thank you so much for adding this 5-star rating of Old Mill Village. We work hard to provide a quality, enjoyable living experience for our residents, and we truly appreciate seeing that effort recognized.
Thanks for your feedback! If there is ever anything we can do to improve, please let us know!
Thanks for your review! If there is anything we can do for you, just let us know!
Thank you very much for this 5-star review of Old Mill Village! We try our best to provide a fantastic living experience, and we love to hear that our efforts are paying off.
Were happy to see that you had a 5-Star experience at Old Mill Village!
Thank you for awarding Old Mill Village a five-star rating, Maya. We're thrilled that we exceeded your expectations! If you ever need anything, don't hesitate to get in touch.

summary.text:
Good

The property at Old Mill Village seems to have garnered an overwhelmingly positive reception from its tenants. User reviews frequently highlight the beauty of the location and the overall pleasant atmosphere, with some reviewers describing the setting as a scenic retreat due to its proximity to natural wildlife and walking paths. The management's effort in maintaining clean and picturesque surroundings has also been noted, contributing to a high quality of life for the residents. Additionally, positive feedback about the convenience of access to local amenities, such as roads into town and nearby shops, is mentioned, which adds to its appeal for prospective tenants. The management’s responsiveness has been acknowledged in reviews, with several instances of owners expressing gratitude for the positive feedback and encouraging tenants to reach out for assistance if needed.

Great

Old Mill Village excels in creating a community-like environment, where residents speak highly of the friendly atmosphere and considerate staff. Particularly, the efforts of specific members of the management team, like Jourdan, have been singled out for their helpful and caring nature, contributing to memorable experiences for the residents. Many user reviews emphasize the unique appeal of the location, including access to Lake Whatcom, which provides stunning views and recreational options. Additionally, the sense of living in a country setting with the convenience of urban amenities close by creates a desirable balance for potential renters. The management's commitment to addressing tenant needs is evident, with residents encouraged to communicate any concerns, further enhancing the living experience at Old Mill Village.

Bad

Despite the generally high praise, there are occasional mentions of issues that could impact the residents' satisfaction. For instance, noise complaints have surfaced in user reviews, indicating potential disturbances caused by neighbors during designated quiet hours. One tenant expressed frustration with noise from an upstairs neighbor, though they acknowledged the management's willingness to address such issues promptly. While this speaks to the property's overall positive management, it highlights that noise can detract from the serenity that many tenants seek in this otherwise tranquil setting. Nonetheless, management's expressed commitment to resolving such issues reassures potential tenants about their proactive approach.

Ugly

There seems to be little in the way of severe complaints or grievances that would fall into the 'ugly' category for Old Mill Village. With no substantial issues reported, residents have expressed satisfaction with the property and its management, and no reviews indicate neglect or significant concerns that might affect the property's reputation. It appears that Old Mill Village has managed to maintain a high standard of living for its tenants, avoiding pitfalls that could have led to more critical feedback. The absence of harsh criticism suggests that the management has done well to uphold strong community relations and apartment upkeep, making it a sought-after location for current and future residents.
